messages.subject: woodard, can't find it
messages.msgSnippet: Can someone send me the link.  I typed it into google but I get minutes from a meeting...not a website specifically for the skatepark or camp. Thanks Kristen
messages.messageBody:
Can someone send me the link. I typed it into google but I get minutes from a meeting...not a website specifically for the skatepark or camp.

Thanks
Kristen
****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
